sections.title: Further reading

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: The section 'Further reading' consists of references and does not contain diagrams, making R1 inapplicable.
The section 'Further reading' focuses on listing references rather than contributing to diagram guidelines, making R2 inapplicable.

sections.meta_notes: The 'Further reading' section is specifically for listing references without images or diagrams, so none of the provided requirements are applicable.
